title: 60: Worldblending
dc:creator: Canon Press
description:
- This week has something for everyone:
- Discussion of the fountain of youth and large turtles;
- Publishing insider baseball about the release of "The Door Before";
- How to blend worlds with very different flavors in writing. Enjoy!

#Storiesaresoulfood #SASF #DoorBefore

Get your signed copy of The Door Before: https://canonpress.com/products/the-door-before-100-cupboards-prequel/
